name: Balloners
description:
Welcome to Ballooners!
You have 2 weapons: The grenade Launcher, and the balloon gun.
You can either scroll the mouse wheel or use buttons 1 and 2 to change weapons.
The objective is to kill all of the enemies, open the vent, and kill the boss.
Each enemy has a buff zone.
When an enemy walks into another enemies buff zone, they bunch together and become impossible to kill.
You use your balloon gun to pull enemies into the air, disabling their buff zone, but you can't kill enemies while they are in the air.
Once an enemy has been ballooned 3 times, they fall back down to the ground.
The best way to kill enemies is to pull them into the air, and pull one down at a time to kill them.
Good luck
